subject: Music
title: Jimi Hendrix: Electric Genius
description: A short lesson to help you apply Jimi Hendrix: Electric Genius.

hook.text: Jimi Hendrix made the electric guitar do things its inventors never imagined possible.

buildup.text: Self-taught and left-handed, he played a right-handed guitar flipped upside down.

discovery.text: His Woodstock Star-Spangled Banner used feedback and distortion to protest the Vietnam War.

twist.text: He was so good that Eric Clapton reportedly considered quitting guitar after watching him play.

climax.text: In just four years of fame, he redefined what an electric guitar could express.

punchline.text: He played for four years. Guitarists have been catching up for fifty.

quiz.question: How did Hendrix play guitar despite being left-handed?
options: He flipped a right-handed guitar upside down
He used a specially built guitar
